Some Videos On Theoretical Neuroscience

This page is under construction. I am planning on posting a more complete outline sometime in the near future. For now, here is the link to my youtube videos. As always, please email me if you have questions or if you have spotted any errors.

  • Computational Neuroscience Playlist

    • Here is some python code that simulates a passive neuronal membrane (used in YouTube videos 2I-2J). In order to run these scripts you will need to install all the SciPy packages.

  • Passive Membrane Python Code

    • Here is some python code that simulates the Hodgkin-Huxley model (used in recent YouTube videos). Download all the files into the same folder, and run the "hodgkinHuxleySolver.py" program with desired command-line arguments.

  • hodgkinHuxleySolver.py
  • injectCurrent.py
  • HHequations.py
